item.title: First Post
item.description: Welcome to my blog! In here you’ll mainly find a collection of tools I’m working on, CTF and HTB write-ups and anything else I decide to write about penetration testing and infosec.
item.content: Welcome to my blog! In here you’ll mainly find a collection of tools I’m working on, CTF and HTB write-ups and anything else I decide to write about penetration testing and infosec.
